name: Phantom Astronaut Lucid VR
description:
Lucid is an immersive visual album from acclaimed artist Phantom Astronaut. Use your HTC Vive to explore five open world dreamscapes set to original lo-fi & dark ambient tracks. From the depths of a radioactive bunker to vast snow-covered landscapes, Lucid stretches the limits of immersive music and storytelling to create a surreal fantasy experience.

"The experience evokes a mash-up of Twin Peaks and 2001 with a Sigur Ros soundtrack produced and remixed by Massive Attack."-Gaynrd.com
